summary: The comeback tour starts with “Goddess Nature Tokens”
title: Adam Neumann Is Here to Elevate The World’s Blockchains
detailed_content: The prodigal son of entrepreneurship has returned.Fresh off the back of convincing investors that his co-working real estate company (sorry, tech company) was worth $47 billion, before a botched IPO, a torrent of yogababble, and the erratic founder…
author: Stephen Moore
